name: 語言與文化
description: 本課程旨在介紹語言與文化的關係，以及語言與文化在華語研究與教學的應用。課程主題涵蓋：文化的定義、語言如何反映文化、文化如何影響語言、跨語言與跨文化溝通、東西文化對比、語言文化的教學策略、教學程序與測試技巧、華語教學的文化議題、華語教師必備的文化知識、語言與文化的研究課題與研究方法等。本課程培養學生透過語言分析進行文化解構的能力，為從事語言與文化研究奠定基礎，並學習在課程設計中結合語言與文化，幫助學習者掌握母語與目標語的文化異同。
goals: 本課程培養主動獨立學習的能力與習慣
syllabus:
The course aims to explore and examine the meaning and construct of culture, the relationship between culture and language, and intercultural communicative competence in various social settings. Specifically, students are introduced to obstacles to intercultural communication, different theories regarding general cultural patterns, the influence of cultural values and beliefs on verbal and nonverbal communication, and differences between the norm of our culture and American and/or other English-speaking cultures. The class materials are imparted mostly via lectures and small group or whole class discussion. Films & related video clips will be used to facilitate students' learning of certain subjects.

Teaching objectives:

1\. Students will be able to learn through guided practice for effective intercultural communication;

2\. Students will be able to learn and use correct and appropriate language and usage in English for effective intercultural communication;

3\. Students will be able to know various communicative tasks to expand their fluency in English;

4\. Students will be able to learn and use various communicative strategies for effective intercultural communication;

5\. Students will be able to sharpen their overall four language skills during the process of cultivating their intercultural communication
